PN.content:
Please identify the "Property Name" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Name". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: 18 In a closer look of the film absorptions , it is also found that the full width at half - maximum ( fwhm ) of PCDSeBT ( 155 nm ) is wider than that of PDCTBT ( 140 nm ) , as a matter of a characteristic of strong intermolecular Se°°°Se interactions , which can potentially further increase J SC value.

Let's think step by step.

| Property Name |
| --- |
| full width at half - maximum (fwhm) |
| J SC value |

The two property names identified in the paragraph are "full width at half - maximum (fwhm)" and "J SC value". These are the only entities in the paragraph that can be classified as property names.

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Material property" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Property Name |
| --- |
| J SC value |

After reviewing the entities identified in the previous answer, I have removed "full width at half - maximum (fwhm)" because it is not a material property. Instead, it is a measurement that can be taken of a material property. "J SC value", on the other hand, is a material property that is related to the efficiency of a solar cell. Therefore, the only valid entity in the paragraph that clearly refers to a material property is "J SC value".
